note: Review the alphabet and basic greetings.
Write a short paragraph describing your family members.
Create a menu for a traditional Russian meal in English.
Write a diary entry in English about your typical day.
Prepare a presentation about your favorite hobby and present it in class.

Prepare a short speech about the impact of technology on society.

Write a letter to your future self, describing your goals and aspirations.
